title: Dachshund celebrates becoming mom to 5 pups in photo shoot
text:
Sugar, a dachshund, posed in an adorable photo session with her newborn puppies.

Interested in Animals? Add Animals as an interest to stay up to date on the latest Animals news, video, and analysis from ABC News. Add Interest

Laura Shockley of Laura Shockley Photography, who also happens to be Sugar's owner, snapped sweet pics of the dog and her puppies, who were born Sept. 3.

Laura Shockley Photography

Laura Shockley

Sugar even posed in a skirt during a maternity shoot before giving birth.

"I am a maternity and newborn photographer ... I decided to play around with Sugar and see if I could have it be special enough," Shockley told "GMA." "We made a little skirt to fit her. We posted the pictures and it went crazy."

Laura Shockley Photography

Three of Sugar's pups already have homes with Shockley's family and friends.

Laura Shockley Photography

Shockley also owns Sugar's partner, Mac, another dachshund and the proud dad of the five puppies.
description: Laura Shockley of Laura Shockley Photography, who also happens to be Sugar's owner, snapped the sweet pics of the dogs.
